details.title: Increased importance of VHF radars in ground-based air defense
details.abstract: We will show how the emergence of new threats is going to affect the operational and technical requirements for Air Defense Systems. We will demonstrate that current ADSs which are augmented by modern VHF radars can be connected together on signal fusion principles, and that such structures are achieving improved effectiveness of airspace control in times of crises or war.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
